page.title: 16VILLAGE SURVEY PART 1
page.content: QUESTIONNAIRES WERE SENT OUT TO ALL THE HOUSES IN WEST BUTTERWICK TO BE ANSWERED BY ALL THOSE OVER THE AGE OF 18.59% REPLIED TO THE QUESTIONS.WE FOUND THAT 67% HAD MOVED INTO THE VILLAGE.151 PEOPLE GAVE A REASON FOR COMING:41% FOR WORK 34% FOR MARRIAGE 10% FOR RETIREMENT 5% TO LIVE IN A VILLAGE 4% TO LIVE WITH PARENTS 3% HOUSE AVAILABLE 1% SCHOOL 1/2% CHEAP HOUSING OR TO LOOK AFTER PARENTS. 264 HOUSES WERE OCCUPIED IN THE VILLAGE.THERE WERE 208 MOTOR VEHICLES,182 BICYCLES AND 29 MOTOR CYCLES OR SCOOTERS.WE RECEIVED REPLIES FROM 167 HOUSES.
